name: Snowy Springs
description:
Welcome to the mountain-top village of Snowy Springs. Observe the beautiful scenery and marvel at the local fauna that thrives in this snowy biome.  Visit the gallery to absorb our culturally rich artistic  gemstones. Relax by the hot natural springs and immerse yourself in their wholesome healing energy.

You play as Alex, one of Snowy Springs inhabitants, who prides themselves on going out of their way to help others. Stop wasting time on your phone, go talk to your neighbours and see if they need any help but don't forget to look out for yourself!

Keyboard and mouse controls

  • WASD - movement
  • IJKL - camera
  • X - interact (context specific)
  • Y - open phone
  • Directional arrows - menu navigation
  • ESC - open pause menu
  • Left click - select
  • Mouse movement - choose selection

Xbox controller

  • Left stick - movement
  • Right stick - camera
  • X button - interact (context specific)
  • Y button - open phone
  • D-Pad - menu navigation
  • Start button - open pause menu
  • A button - select

Credits

  • Game designed and developed by Holly Hudson and Harvey Hayman
  • Produced by Bernardo Angeletti 
  • Sound designed by Joseph Russell, Liam Sharpe and Lucas Lehmann
  • Music composed by Nir Perlman and Umberto Gaudino
  • Graphic design by A&B Studio (Amelia Leuzzi and Bonnie Eichelberger)
  • Mental health consultancy by UK charity Gaming In Mind

Snowy Springs was developed at the National Film and Television School
